title: 2 Easy Ways to Link Your Phone to Your Facebook Account

steps.title: Open the Play Store or App Store.
steps.content: Open the Play Store or App Store. On Android, you'll use the Google Play Store. On iPhone or iPad, you'll use the App Store.

steps.title: Tap the search bar.
steps.content: Tap the search bar. On Android, you can find this at the top of the page. On iPhone, tap Search in the bottom-right corner first.

steps.title: Enter facebook and search.
steps.content: Enter facebook and search. This will load results.

steps.title: Tap Facebook.
steps.content: Tap Facebook . This is next to an icon with a white f and blue background.

steps.title: Tap Install or Get.
steps.content: Tap Install or Get . You can find this next to the Facebook icon. Your download will begin. It may take a few moments. When it's finished, you can find the app on your home page or App Library.

steps.title: Tap the Facebook app.
steps.content: Tap the Facebook app. Once it opens, you'll need to log into your account. When you're logged in, you can start using Facebook on your mobile phone.

steps.title: Click your profile picture.
steps.content: Click your profile picture. This is in the top-right corner. If you aren't already logged into your Facebook account, enter your email address and password to do so now. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Click Settings & privacy.
steps.content: Click Settings & privacy . You can find this below your name.

steps.title: Click Settings.
steps.content: Click Settings . A new page will open.

steps.title: Click Accounts Center.
steps.content: Click Accounts Center . This is in the left panel, at the top.

steps.title: Click Personal details.
steps.content: Click Personal details . You can find this below the Account settings header.

steps.title: Click Contact info.
steps.content: Click Contact info . This is at the top of the page.

steps.title: Click Add new contact.
steps.content: Click Add new contact . This is below your email address.

steps.title: Click Add mobile number.
steps.content: Click Add mobile number . You can find this in the drop-down menu.

steps.title: Enter your mobile phone number.
steps.content: Enter your mobile phone number. Make sure this is a number you have access to. You'll be sent a confirmation code.

steps.title: Enter the confirmation code.
steps.content: Enter the confirmation code. This will be sent as an SMS text to your phone.

steps.title: Click Next, then Close.
steps.content: Click Next , then Close . Your phone number is now added to your account.
